metadata.name: Capybara #1
metadata.description: The Capybara Project NFT is a collection of 50 unique Capybara NFTsâ€” unique digital collectibles living on the Polygon blockchain. Capybaras are not randomly generated but artistically designed to express its emotions. Each Capybara includes a representative unlockable postcard of its trips. One new Capybara dropping every Wednesday. Grab yours!
